class gstBoundingSphere

Represents a bounding sphere.

From header file: gstBoundingSphere.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstBoundingSphere
~gstBoundingSphere
Functions
getCenter Returns the position of the center of gstBoundingSphere.
getRadius Returns the radius of gstBoundingSphere.
inside Tests if pt is inside gstSimpleSphere.
intersectP This method will return TRUE if the line defined by the input points intersects the sphere.
setCenter Sets the position of the center of gstBoundingSphere to _center.
setRadius Sets the radius of gstBoundingSphere to _radius.
getLargestBoundingSphere Returns a gstBoundingSphere with DBL_MAX radius.
